The Center offers the following educational services.


On-Site Tutoring


High School volunteers offer tutoring services to local Middle School students every weekend. Volunteers are recognized with a special letter and certificate at the year end


Remote Tutoring


Underprivileged High School students in India are offered weekly Math, Science and English classes by volunteers working out of the media room at the Center.


Book Drive


Throughout the year, children's books are collected and shipped to needy children in the Caribbean.


Children's Summer Camp


An annual one week summer camp is conducted by dedicated volunteer teachers who help children nourish their mind, body, and soul while having lots of fun.


Lectures & Seminars


General educational lectures on various topics such as personal security, college counseling, emotional awareness, education in human values conference etc. are offered occasionally.
